amendment.description: Amendment provides a civil remedy for victims of illegal drugs and holds those who manufacture or distribute a controlled substance liable for direct or indirect harm by use of the controlled substance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 22 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to provide a civil remedy for victims of illegal drugs and holds those who manufacture or distribute a controlled substance liable for direct or indirect harm by use of the controlled substance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Latham amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 3 (Roll no. 217).
